topic.title: Adverse Event Type Observation - conformance rules

section.p: Kind of adverse event involving EMS personnel

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11484 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.90"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11205)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10710)/@code="67555-3" Work related exposure, injury, or death Provider NEMSIS type (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10709)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10711), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderAdverseEventType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.72 DYNAMIC (CONF:10712)
NEMSIS Trace: EOther.06
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11205)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10710)/@code="67555-3" Work related exposure, injury, or death Provider NEMSIS type (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10709)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10711), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderAdverseEventType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.72 DYNAMIC (CONF:10712)
NEMSIS Trace: EOther.06

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.90"/> <code code="67555-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Work related exposure, injury, or death Provider NEMSIS type"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
